properties.name: archaius.propagate.environmentChangedEvent
properties.description: Propagates EnvironmentChanged events to Archaius ConfigurationManager.

properties.name: eureka.client.healthcheck.enabled
properties.description: Enables the Eureka health check handler.

properties.name: management.metrics.binders.hystrix.enabled
properties.description: Enables creation of OK Http Client factory beans.

properties.name: hystrix.shareSecurityContext
properties.description: Enables auto-configuration of the Hystrix concurrency strategy plugin hook who will transfer the `SecurityContext` from your main thread to the one used by the Hystrix command.

properties.name: ribbon.restclient.enabled
properties.description: Enables the use of the deprecated Ribbon RestClient.

properties.name: ribbon.http.client.enabled
properties.description: Deprecated property to enable Ribbon RestClient.

properties.name: ribbon.eureka.enabled
properties.description: Enables the use of Eureka with Ribbon.

properties.name: ribbon.okhttp.enabled
properties.description: Enables the use of the OK HTTP Client with Ribbon.

properties.name: turbine.stream.enabled
properties.description: Enables Autoconfiguration for a Spring Cloud Turbine using Spring Cloud Stream.

properties.name: zuul.ribbon.eager-load.enabled
properties.description: Enables eager loading of Ribbon clients on startup.
